abstract: Daikin Industries, a Japanese air-conditioner maker, has struck an agreement to buy Goodman Global for about $3.7 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Tuesday, clinching the company’s long quest to buy its American rival.
snippet: Daikin Industries, a Japanese air-conditioner maker, has struck an agreement to buy Goodman Global for about $3.7 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Tuesday, clinching the company’s long quest to buy its American rival.

headline.main: Daikin of Japan Said to Buy Goodman for $3.7 Billion
headline.print_headline: Maker of Air-Conditioners In Japan Is Said to Buy Rival

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
